NotFoundPage.title: Сторінка не знайдена
NotFoundPage.description: Будь ласка, ще раз перевірте адресний рядок браузера або скористайтеся навігацією, щоб перейти на відому сторінку.

Error.description:
На жаль, ми зіткнулися з помилкою.

Ви можете спробувати оновити сторінку яку ви відвідували.
Error.title: Щось пішло не так!

1.title: Windows for the home
1.description: Your home deserves better. Windows that fill your home with light

2.title: Safety and durability
2.description: Your home is under reliable protection. Windows you can trust.

3.title: Individual design
3.description: Every window is art. Design that emphasizes style

4.title: Energy saving
4.description: Warm in winter, cool in summer. Savings start with windows.

5.title: Panoramic windows
5.description: Expanding your world. Windows that open horizons.

ManufacturerInfo.title: Windows and Doors – Straight from the VI-3
ManufacturerInfo.description: VI-3, a trusted manufacturer, delivers CERTIFIED WINDOWS that meet the highest, independently verified standards.

1.description: uPVC and aluminum windows and doors

MessageBanner.title: SEND US A MESSAGE
MessageBanner.subtitle: – we will get back to you / prepare an offer for you

1.title: PVC windows
1.description: Our offer includes energy-efficient PVC windows which meet the highest standards on the European market. We manufacture PVC windows based on high-performance profiles from Schüco and Kömmerling.
1.alt: Private house with large white windows

2.title: Aluminium windows
2.description: We are a Polish manufacturer of aluminium windows. Made with solid and heat-insulating profiles from Aliplast and Aluron, our aluminium windows represent the highest quality in their category.
2.alt: Large private house with panoramic black windows

Doors.title: FRONT AND TERRACE DOORS – directly from a Polish manufacturer
Doors.description: All doors produced by TUR-PLAST feature solid construction, great thermal performance, and innovative solutions. We make PVC front and terrace doors based on solid profiles: Schüco CT70, Schüco LivIng82, and Kömmerling 76AD. Our aluminium doors are made with profiles from the Belgian company Aliplast as well as Polish aluminium systems from Aluron.

1.title: Hs/psk terrace doors
1.description: Low-threshold sliding terrace doors directly from the manufacturer are a perfect solution for modern and spacious interiors. They have a lot of glazing, making them able to optimally light up the room. The excellent thermal insulation and the new fittings technology make TUR-PLAST’s products bring you comfort and joy of use. Our offer includes two system solutions: HS and PSK.
1.alt: Large panoramic glass doors in the house

2.title: Pvc/aluminium front doors
2.description: The manufacture of doors with PVC or aluminium profiles occupies a separate section at TUR-PLAST. Our Salesmen will help you select the door panel colour, shape and look as well as the type of fittings and glazing.
2.alt: Black entrance door with silver hardware

RollerShutters.title: External blinds
RollerShutters.description: External blinds: top-mounted and adaptive, concealed and surface-mounted, are an effective way of saving energy. Our roller shutters will provide you with great thermal and acoustic insulation as well as a sense of intimacy and safety. We offer external roller shutters in PVC or aluminium boxes, concealed or oval surface-mounted.

1.title: Top-mounted roller shutters
1.description: We offer you a new versatile system of top-mounted roller shutters for installation on both sides, used in newly-built and renovated houses. Our EXTE roller shutter system provides excellent thermal insulation, complying with the regulations applicable on the European market.

2.title: Adaptive roller shutters
2.description: Concealed adaptive roller shutters with two modes of installation and OVAL surface-mounted adaptive roller shutters are some of our well proven products. Characterstic features of these systems include the aluminium guidebars, shutter curtain, and shutter box with a revision located outside the building.

3.title: Sun protection covers
3.description: We recommend the solid and aesthetic screen-type roller shutter systems for protecting rooms with a lot of glazing from excessive insolation. In an extended position, the screens can also be a perfect barrier against insects and various types of pollution.

GuideElement.subtitle: WINDOWS – DOORS – ROLLER SHUTTERS
GuideElement.title: GUIDE
GuideElement.description: Are you unsure as to what windows, doors, or roller shutters to choose for your house or apartment? Are you looking for the latest solutions in window and door joinery? Do you need to learn some professional window-related terms? – please feel free to visit our website: GUIDE TO WINDOWS-DOORS-ROLLER SHUTTERS.

ProjectsElement.subtitle: OUR PROJECTS – WINDOWS – DOORS
ProjectsElement.title: measurement – price valuation – manufacture – installation – servicing
ProjectsElement.description: Please feel free to view the examples of projects executed by the company TUR-PLAST, a manufacturer of energy-efficient PVC and aluminium windows and doors based in Poland.

1.title: Air permeability
1.description: We use the most energy-efficient PVC and aluminium windows and doors. You can save energy and money with our products.

2.title: Water Resistance
2.description: We use the most energy-efficient PVC and aluminium windows and doors. You can save energy and money with our products.

3.title: Wind load resistance
3.description: We use the most energy-efficient PVC and aluminium windows and doors. You can save energy and money with our products.

4.title: Coefficient of heat transfer Uw
4.description: We use the most energy-efficient PVC and aluminium windows and doors. You can save energy and money with our products.

WindowsPage.pageSubtitle: functionality / comfort / aesthetics / effective thermal insulation
WindowsPage.pageDesc1: Choice of the right window is a serious decision which involves investing some money. When choosing windows, customers should make sure if the product goes well with the design of their flat or house, if its operation is convenient, if it helps to save energy, and finally if it guarantees maximum security.
WindowsPage.pageDesc2: A window is a combination of profiles, complex window panes, fittings, seals and other additional accessories. Each of the elements has a great influence on such window qualities as aesthetics, comfort, security and energy efficiency. This is why, when buying windows, it is important to pay attention to their individual elements.

1.desc: Window profiles determine the durability and tightness of the entire window structure.

2.desc: Window panes constitute about 65-85% of the whole window surface and hence, they influence significantly such window qualities as energy efficiency and security.

3.desc: Fittings and seals contribute to acoustic and thermal insulation and guarantee security and convenient operation.

4.desc: Additional accessories enhance aesthetic aspects and convenience of use.

1.title: PVC WINDOWS – Schüco Profiles
1.description: Schüco window profiles are made of very high-strength material. We use reinforcement with corrosion-resistant 1.5-2mm thick steel sections around the entire perimeter of the frame and sash. A window construction that is this stable and durable perfectly withstands the weight of the quite heavy energy-efficient triple glazing unit, and has excellent thermal and sound insulation.

2.title: PVC WINDOWS – Kömmerling Profiles
2.description: We recommend the energy-efficient and eco-friendly window systems from the German company KÖMMERLING. Our offer includes three systems: KÖMMERLING 76 AD, KÖMMERLING 76 MD, KÖMMERLING 88 MD. Each of the offered systems is available in white, veneered, as well as with innovative aluminium overlays. Please feel free to take a closer look at our offer.

3.title: ALUMINIUM WINDOWS – Aliplast profile
3.description: ALUMINIUM WINDOWS from Poland, based on the WINDOW PROFILES by ALIPLAST, available in the Imperial, Superial and Star systems, are characterised by extreme rigidness, high-quality coating, excellent thermal insulation, and modern, varied designs. ALUMINIUM WINDOWS and DOORS by Tur-Plast from Poland were created thanks to many years of experience and the use of modern technology.

4.title: ALUMINIUM WINDOWS – Aluron Profiles
4.description: Windows made in Poland based on aluminium profiles from ALURON fulfil the rigorous energy-efficiency requirements, provide safety as well as comfort and functionality of use. As a manufacturer of windows based in Poland, we offer a range of non-standard and unusual solutions. Please feel free to contact us.

windowsElementsList.title: WINDOWS ELEMENTS
windowsElementsList.description: Profile systems are important in window construction. However, there are a number of components of window joinery that largely affect energy efficiency, safety and comfort in the daily use of our windows. The type of glazing, fittings and seals used largely determines the quality of the windows. The visual aspect of window joinery, in turn, is strongly influenced by the choice of mullions, colours, or additional window accessories.

1.title: Glazing units for windows
1.description: A significant element of any PVC window are panes. Depending on the size of the window and on the division into panels, the glass can occupy from 25% to 95% of the window area. Therefore, it is the quality and parameters of the glazing units that determine whether and how the window will fulfil its function – which is ensuring the best thermal insulation, safety, and sound insulation.

2.title: Window fittings and seals
2.description: While being a very inconspicuous element of a window structure, seals are in fact responsible for extremely important properties, such as thermal insulation; water tightness; room ventilation; sound insulation.

3.title: Window mullions
3.description: To emphasise the character of the windows, elevation, or even the whole building, we offer PVC windows and aluminium windows with mullions. This applies especially to older or stylized buildings. Mullions may be structural, inter-pane or Viennese.

4.title: Colour palette for window profiles
4.description: Please see the palette of sample colours in which we manufacture windows. The advantages of our veneered windows include: the possibility of choosing between veneering on one or both sides; elegant and harmonious appearance; extreme resistance to changing weather conditions; no need for additional special maintenance, and ease of care.

5.title: Window accessories / additions
5.description: Please feel free to view our offer of all kinds of accessories and additions for PVC and aluminium windows.

windowsillsList.title: WINDOWSILLS
windowsillsList.description: In the comprehensive offer from TUR-PLAST, you will find solid and thermally insulated internal and external windowsills.

1.title: Internal windowsills
1.description: Möller LIGNODUR internal windowsills are impact-resistant and scratch-resistant interior finishing elements for both older and modern buildings. What sets them apart from competing products is the guaranteed thickness of walls and reinforcements embossed in the form of a strong core made of a wood flour and PVC composite.

2.title: External windowsills
2.description: We offer steel and aluminium external windowsills. Please feel free to take a closer look at our offer.

3.title: Thermally insulated window moulding
3.description: We recommend taking a moment to see our offer of thermally insulated window moulding as well as external, internal and double-sided XPS profiles. With layered installation of energy-efficient windows, it is also worthwhile to make sure you have a thermally insulated windowsill.

WindowsPVCSchucoPage.pageSubtitle: / Excellent energy efficiency thanks to innovative technology /
WindowsPVCSchucoPage.description: Schüco window profiles are made of very high-strength material. We use reinforcement with corrosion-resistant 1.5-2mm thick steel sections around the entire perimeter of the frame and sash. A window construction that is this stable and durable perfectly withstands the weight of the quite heavy energy-efficient triple glazing unit, and has excellent thermal and sound insulation.

ProfilesImg.title: In our offer you will find the following types of Schüco profiles:

ProfilesScheme.title: Schüco Windows – profile LivIng 82 MD and AD Classic
ProfilesScheme.description: Schüco Living 82 MD and AS is a new generation of window and door systems for modern construction. The use of the innovative TWIN system allows the frame with double (AS series) or triple (MD series) sealing to be easily fitted to the window sash. In addition, this new twin system uses the world’s first EPDM heat seal. Schüco, thanks to cooperation with Semperit, has exclusive rights to this type of sealing technology. It is due to the use of flexible and heat-sealable material that the tightness in windows and doors has increased significantly, especially in problematic corner areas.

ProfilesCross-sections.title: Window cross-sections in which different GLAZING BEADS were used, depending on the thickness of the glazing units used.

1.title: LivIng profile with a 48 mm glazing unit 4-18-4-18-4

2.title: LivIng profile with a 36 mm glazing unit 4-12-4-12-4

3.title: LivIng profile with a 24 mm glazing unit 4-16-4

3.desc: Possible glazing depths – from 24 mm to 52 mm

1.desc: Thermal insulation according to DIN EN 12412-2 – Uf = 0,96 – 1,0 W/(m2K)

2.desc: Sound insulation according to DIN EN ISO 140-3 (max.) *- Rw,P = 47 dB

3.desc: Anti-burglary resistance to DIN EN 1627 = Rc2

4.desc: Air permeability according to DIN EN 12207 (class) – 4

6.desc: Wind load resistance to DIN EN 12210 (class)** – C5/B5

7.desc: Mechanical load resistance to DIN EN 13115 (class) – 4

8.desc: Resistance to repeated opening and closing to DIN EN 12400 (class) – 2

10.desc: Load capacity of safety devices – requirement met

1.desc: * Depending on the profile and glazing
The PVC Schuco LivIng 82 MD and AS system is made in 7-chamber technology with excellent insulation properties.

2.desc: The value of the Uf heat transfer coefficient is: up to 1 W/(m2K) for the AS series and up to 0.96 W/(m2K) for the MD series.

3.desc: With two (AS series) or three (MD series) sealing surfaces, the LivIng system provides optimal protection against wind, rain and noise.

4.desc: When using a frame with a central seal (MD series), the system meets the requirements of the German Institute of Window Technology ift Rosenheim in the field of passive construction.

5.desc: It is possible to include double glazing, unit thickness: 24 mm to 52 mm.

6.desc: The increased installation depth ensures greater safety and better protection against burglary.

7.desc: Optimal light access is guaranteed thanks to the narrow visible profile width of 120 mm as standard.

8.desc: The first weldable EPDM seal integrated with the Schüco LivIng system significantly increases the sealing effect in the corners of the windows.

9.desc: The high quality EPDM seals used are highly elastic, which is why they do not crack or deform, they are resistant to changing weather conditions.

10.desc: We use silver grey seals in the white profiles of the Schüco LivIng system and black seals in the foil profiles.

11.desc: All profiles (frame and sash) are reinforced around the entire perimeter with corrosion-resistant 2mm-thick steel sections, which significantly affects the stability, safety and durability of the window.

12.desc: If the client so wishes, the windows can be made as anti-burglary windows up to the Wk2 class.

13.desc: We use high-class MACO MULTI-MATIC fittings.

14.desc: Veneer windows have narrow, nice-looking and almost invisible welds.

15.desc: Profiles are available in a full range of colours and wood-like veneers.

ProfilesSchemeAluminium.title: Schüco Windows – with aluminium overlays – TOP ALU

1.description: Our standard offer of window joinery manufactured in Poland has been supplemented with PVC windows with aluminium overlays. We produce them based on a Schüco window constructed in the CT70 or LivIng 82 MD / AS system in the CLASSIC style. The elegant aluminium overlays allow optimal adjustment of windows to the facade. The rich RAL colour palette will satisfy even the most demanding tastes, and the possible colour variation between the frame and the sash broadens this range of possibilities even further. Overlays work especially in modern buildings, commercial and service premises, or office buildings. The use of aluminium overlays makes the PVC windows unique.

ProfilesSchemeNordic.title: Schüco Windows – profile Alu Inside NORDIC

1.description: The Scandinavian Windows system, with outward-opening windows, has been designed especially for the Scandinavian and North German markets. A characteristic feature of this system are windows that open outwards and have the highest stability and excellent thermal insulation parameters. This system allows the implementation of windows with glazing bars characteristic for the region, stylish glazing beads and special fittings (ASSA ABLOY) with various opening methods, such as turn fittings, Top-Hung or Top-Swing fittings. The Schüco Alu Inside Nordic window system is certified by the Danish Technological Institute.

3.desc: Possible glazing depths – from 18 mm to 52 mm

1.desc: Thermal insulation according to DIN EN 12412-2 – Uf = 0,87 W/(m2K)

2.desc: Sound insulation according to DIN EN ISO 140-3 (max.) *- Rw,P = 46 dB

3.desc: Anti-burglary resistance to DIN EN 1627 = Rc2

4.desc: Air permeability according to DIN EN 12207 (class) – 4

6.desc: Wind load resistance to DIN EN 12210 (class)** – C3

7.desc: Mechanical load resistance to DIN EN 13115 (class) – 4

1.desc: * Depending on the profile and glazing
It has three sealing planes and technologically patented joints between aluminium and plastic.

2.desc: If the client so wishes, the windows can be made as anti-burglary windows up to the Wk2 class.

4.desc: Veneer windows have narrow, nice-looking and almost invisible welds.

5.desc: Profiles are available in a full range of colours and wood-like veneers.

6.desc: The high quality EPDM seals used are highly elastic, which is why they do not crack or deform, they are resistant to changing weather conditions.

DoorsPage.title: EXTERIOR DOORS from Poland
DoorsPage.subtitle: functionality / comfort / aesthetics / effective thermal insulation
DoorsPage.description: All doors produced by the Polish-based company VI-3 feature solid construction, great thermal performance, and innovative solutions. We make PVC exterior doors based on solid profiles: Schüco CT70, Schüco LivIng, and Kömmerling 76AD. Our aluminium doors are made with profiles from the Belgian company Aliplast as well as Polish aluminium systems from Aluron. Our offer includes terrace and balcony doors made on a window or door profile; unusual doors, practically in any designed shape, as well as folding doors – a great solution for restaurants, cafés and modern living rooms.

1.title: PVC Doors – Schüco Profiles
1.description: The doors are made of high-impact, deformation-resistant PVC from the renowned company Schüco. Good thermal insulation is ensured by multi-chamber profiles, while steel reinforcements of a large size and optimal thickness contribute to the stiffness and stability of the product.

2.title: PVC Doors – Kömmerling Profiles
2.description: Choosing the right door significantly affects the visual effect of any house, giving it a specific character. With the innovative KÖMMERLING 76 AD door system, we are able to design any door structure that meets the individual needs of each client. Please feel free to take a closer look at our set of ready-made door fillings with the highest properties.

3.title: ALUMINIUM Doors – Aliplast Profiles
3.description: We produce aluminium doors based on Aliplast profiles. These systems are characterised by excellent stiffness, high-quality coatings and modern design. Thanks to the use of special thermal inserts, we obtain very high thermal insulation parameters.

4.title: ALUMINIUM Doors – Aluron Profiles
4.description: The aluminium systems of the thriving Polish company Aluron are modern constructions intended for the production of very well thermally insulated doors. The use of the innovative ANTI-BI-METAL technology prevents the door leaves from deforming when heated by sunlight, as well as at very low temperatures.

5.title: Balcony/Terrace Doors
5.description: The doors are built on a stable standard-width or wider window frame and are intended for apartments in blocks of flats and exits to balconies in houses where it is not possible or necessary to enter from the outside. Our terrace doors feature a low threshold, solid Dr. Hahn hinges, a three-point latch locked with a handle, the possibility of using a second lock and safe locking elements and, most importantly, two types of opening: to the inside as a balcony door or to the outside as an entrance door.

6.title: Folding Doors
6.description: The use of folding doors in rooms with large glazing is very convenient because they open to the side, without creating any barriers to the passage, in the form of posts or fixed leaves. Especially in houses surrounded by large gardens, with this glass and aluminium retractable wall we are able to obtain maximum contact with the beautiful green surroundings. Folding doors are often used in hotels, shops, and private homes where there is a need to create more usable space.

doorsFeatures.title: DOOR FEATURES
doorsFeatures.description: The wide range of exclusive door fillings as well as panels from companies such as Paneldoor and Veyna, the extensive selection of door accessories, and the fulfilment of the highest standards ensure that Polish doors purchased from Tur-Plast will serve you for many years.

1.title: Door Fillings – Panels for PVC and Aluminium Doors
1.description: Door fillings may be: inset or overlay; made of laminated boards or aluminium; decorated with various frames, glass elements, inlays, cuttings or appliqués; in any chosen colour and structure. The door fillings in our offer are characterised by high resistance to mechanical damage, difficult weather conditions, and noise. With the wide selection of designs, colours and variety of glazing, even the most demanding customers are able to choose a filling they are fully satisfied with.

2.title: Accessories / Additions for PVC and Aluminium Doors
2.description: As a producer and seller of doors, we know that all kinds of accessories are often very important. Our market systematically provides us with sets of newer and more practical solutions. There is a whole variety of handles, pulls, letterboxes, peepholes, and panes, all different in terms of technical parameters and style. Some accessories can be selected for classic buildings, and others for modern ones. Please feel free to view our systematically expanded offer of door accessories.

PVCDoorsSchucoPage.title: EXTERIOR DOORS from PVC – Schüco profiles

description.p1: The doors are made of high-impact, deformation-resistant PVC from the renowned company Schüco. Good thermal insulation is ensured by multi-chamber profiles, while steel reinforcements of a large size and optimal thickness contribute to the stiffness and stability of the product.
description.p2: The structure of the profiles gives us the possibility of installing multi-point locks and reinforced locking elements. This type of solution ensures we obtain safe doors with a long service life. Our exterior doors made of PVC have a low aluminium threshold with a thermal break.
description.p3: The door leaf filling consists of two sandwich panels made of plastic, separated by polyurethane foam, which ensures very good thermal insulation of the door. Door panels can be enriched with various types of glass and ornamental frames. The surface layer of PVC panels is covered with high-quality acrylic films or varnishes, resistant to weather conditions and UV rays. In addition to the models of door fillings presented in our galleries, we are happy to make doors according to your individual project.

SchucoProfilesSection.title: OUR OFFER INCLUDES TWO TYPES OF DOOR PROFILES BY Schüco: Corona CT 70 and LivIng 82:

1.bannerTitle: Schüco door sill cross-section – Corona CT 70

1.title: Schüco DOOR – profil LivIng 82
1.description: Schüco LivIng are innovative systems for modern plastic doors.

1.desc: The 6/7-chamber Schüco LivIng door system achieves excellent thermal insulation parameters with an installation depth of 82 mm.

2.desc: The first weldable EPDM seal is integrated with the Schüco LivIng door system. By using a flexible, weldable material, a better sealing effect is achieved in the difficult corner area of the element, while obtaining an elegant appearance as there is no seal hardening.

3.desc: The Schüco LivIng system meets the individual requirements of investors in both private houses and large buildings, either new or modernized.

4.desc: Schüco AutomotiveFinish glossy metallic shades as well as the Schüco UnlimitedFinish and Schüco TopAlu PVC film ranges are all available for colour selection.

5.desc: We use modern silver gray seals in the white profiles of the Schüco LivIng system and black seals in the foiled profiles.

6.desc: The Schüco LivIng plastic door system can be equipped with overlay fillings or door fillings to cover the leaf. This provides a lot of freedom in arranging individual entrance doors.

3.description: Cross-section through the LivIng 82 door opening outwards

4.description: Cross-section through the LivIng 82 door opening inwards

1.title: TECHNICAL INFORMATION:
1.description: Schüco LivIng are innovative systems for modern plastic doors.

4.desc: Glass / panel thickness min. – max. – 24 mm – 52 mm

5.desc: Surface finish – Decorative foils / TopAlu / AutomotiveFinish

12.desc: Door sill – Automatic door sealing, Low collision-free door threshold made of glass-fibre reinforced plastic or aluminium, compliant with DIN 18025.

PanelTypes.title: PANEL STRIPS – types:
PanelTypes.description: See door cross-sections in which different panel strips were used, depending on the thickness of the door filling used.

1.description: LivIng door profile with a 48 mm panel

2.description: LivIng door profile with a 36 mm panel

2.desc: made of laminated boards or aluminium

3.desc: decorated with various frames, glass elements, inlays, cuttings or appliqués

4.desc: of any colour of your choice

2.description: Door opening by entering code on numeric keyboard

3.description: Door opening system with fingerprint reader

PVCDoorsKommerlingPage.title: EXTERIOR DOORS from PVC – Kömmerling profiles

description.p1: Choosing the right door significantly affects the visual effect of any house, giving it a specific character. With the innovative KÖMMERLING 76 AD door system, we are able to design any door structure that meets the individual needs of each client. Please feel free to take a closer look at the set of ready-made door fillings with the highest properties offered by the Polish-based door manufacturer TUR-PLAST.

ALUDoorsAliplastPage.title: EXTERIOR DOORS from Aluminium – Aliplast profiles

description.p1: Our offer of aluminium doors from Poland includes products made of high-quality Aliplast aluminium profiles. We recommend three-chamber systems in which modern solutions have been applied to increase thermal insulation properties by means of special thermal inserts placed in-between the thermal breaks and around the panes.

ALUDoorsAluronPage.title: EXTERIOR DOORS from Aluminium – Aluron profiles

description.p1: Doors made in Poland by Tur-Plast based on the Aluron AS 75 door system are designed for energy-efficient and passive construction. With the innovative ANTI-BI-METAL technology system used, door leaves are specially protected against deformation when heated by sunlight, as well as at very low temperatures.

The doors are built on a stable standard-width or wider window frame and are intended for apartments in blocks of flats and exits to balconies in houses where it is not possible or necessary to enter from the outside. A modification of this solution is the use of a low aluminium threshold, which does not constitute a barrier for children, wheelchairs, etc.The handle is only mounted from the inside. Some practical additions to these balcony doors include a mini-pull with a latch and a brake in the handle. The first allows you to close the door from the outside, and the other – to lock it in a specific opening position.An intermediate solution between a balcony door and a terrace (entrance) door is a balcony door on a wide leaf with a handle on each side and a lock.

The Polish-based company TUR-PLAST produces ALUMINIUM FOLDING DOORS based on the three-chamber, thermally insulated PANORAMA system by ALIPLAST. This product makes the offer more attractive as it gives architects and individual clients a greater choice in the interior design of houses and business premises.

DoorPanelsPage.title: DOOR FEATURES – Door Fillings – Panels for PVC and Aluminium Doors

description.p1: The door leaf filling consists of two sandwich panels made of plastic, separated by polyurethane foam. This combination ensures very good thermal insulation of the door. The panels can be enriched with various types of glass and ornamental frames. The surface layer of PVC panels is covered with high-quality acrylic films or varnishes, resistant to weather conditions and UV rays.

AccessoriesPage.title: DOOR FEATURES – Accessories and Additions for PVC and Aluminium Doors.

description.p1: Choosing the right door significantly affects the visual effect of any house, giving it a specific character. With the innovative KÖMMERLING 76 AD door system, we are able to design any door structure that meets the individual needs of each client. Please feel free to take a closer look at the set of ready-made door fillings with the highest properties offered by the Polish-based door manufacturer TUR-PLAST.

SlidingDoorsPage.title: SLIDING TERRACE DOORS from Poland
SlidingDoorsPage.description: Sliding terrace doors are an ideal solution for modern and large interiors. They have a lot of glazing, making them able to optimally light up the room. They have very good thermal insulation (no thermal bridges), and thanks to the modern fittings technology, we can experience real comfort and joy from using large sliding doors. The solutions proposed by Tur-Plast are an alternative to standard double-leaf balconies. Our offer includes solid and exclusive lift-and-slide terrace doors made of PVC and aluminium.

1.title: PVC Sliding Terrace Doors - HS Type - Schüco Profiles
1.description: We recommend Schüco ThermoSlide and EasySlide lift-and-slide doors. Even very large wings can be moved easily. The flat and triple-insulated threshold increases the comfort of use and eliminates the risk of a „cold area” at the floor.

2.title: PVC Sliding Terrace Doors - HS Type - Kömmerling Profiles
2.description: The exclusive PremiDoor 76 lift-and-slide doors recommended in our offer provide exceptional living comfort. The door leaf moves smoothly and noiselessly along the guides. The excellent-quality seals ensure optimal wind- and water-tightness and protects against external noise. In this system, we obtain the highest parameters of thermal insulation.

3.title: PVC Sliding Terrace Doors - PSK Type - Schüco Profiles
3.description: Our offer includes the currently popular PSK sliding doors (Parallel-Schiebe-Kipp-Tür – parallel-slide-and-tilt doors). These types of structures are built using standard window profiles. After turning the handle from the closed position, the leaf extends into the room, perpendicular to the window plane, and then slides to the side. The door also has a leaf tilt function.

4.title: PVC Sliding Terrace Doors - PSK Type - Kömmerling Profiles
4.description: We produce PSK-type sliding terrace doors which are an attractive alternative to typical balcony doors. This system allows you to save space that is needed when opening traditional balcony or terrace doors. The PSK doors based on Kömmerling PVC profiles have the option of tilting the leaf in addition to sliding.

5.title: ALUMINIUM Sliding Terrace Doors - HS Type - Aliplast Profiles
5.description: A modern structure; the use of lift-and-slide fittings in the innovative UltraGlide aluminium system with a low threshold is an excellent solution improving the accessibility of buildings for disabled people. It is possible to use colours from the RAL colour palette, structural colours, wood-like colours, anode, bicolour.

6.title: ALUMINIUM Sliding Terrace Doors - HS Type - Aluron Profiles
6.description: The aluminium lift-and-slide doors based on the AS 178HS system is a combination of innovative solutions with modern design, creating a new generation of all-glass lift-and-slide doors. With this system, it is possible to build large movable terrace glazing with a low and warm threshold. Its construction mechanisms enable safe and comfortable sliding of heavy leaves, manually or automatically.

SlidingDoorsHsSchPage.title: PVC SLIDING TERRACE DOORS - HS Type - Schüco Profiles
SlidingDoorsHsSchPage.description: PERFECT CONNECTION BETWEEN INTERIOR AND SURROUNDINGS… Schüco EasySlide and Schüco LivIngSlide lift-and-slide doors fill the interior with natural light and provide a beautiful view. The solutions offered by the Polish-based manufacturer TUR-PLAST enable the best use of usable space for work and rest. Energy-saving HS sliding doors are the key to new open spaces where the winter garden smoothly flows into the living space, and the balcony or terrace constitutes a collision-free extension of the usable space. Just move the glazed plane to the side, and the border between the indoor and outdoor space will disappear.

1.alt: Large panoramic glass sliding doors in the house

2.alt: Large panoramic glass sliding doors in the house

SlidingDoorsHsSchPage.desc2: SIX OPENING OPTIONS with one or two sliding leaves. This allows to fine-tune the woodwork to your individual requirements in terms of thermal insulation, dimensions and comfort of use.
SlidingDoorsHsSchPage.desc3: TWO SYSTEMS of lift-and-slide doors: Schüco EasySlide and Schüco LivIngSlide. TUR-PLAST is a Polish producer of individual solutions for HS-type sliding terrace doors with a low threshold. We offer comfort in a number of options. Thanks to the system and aesthetic compatibility and flexibility, sliding doors in the Schüco systems can be easily combined with energy-saving and passive Schüco windows.
SlidingDoorsHsSchPage.bannerTitle: PVC Sliding Terrace Doors – HS Schüco LivIngSlide

desc4.p1: THE NEWEST Schüco LivIngSlide lift-and-slide door system is precisely designed to meet all the restrictive criteria set for highly energy-efficient houses. Directly from the manufacturer – TUR-PLAST, these terrace doors achieve excellent thermal insulation results. With the use of glass pane with Ug = 0.6 W(m2K), the doors can achieve an excellent heat transfer coefficient, even up to Uw = 0.8 W(m2K).
desc4.p2: The leaves with a depth of 82 mm, multi-chamber profiles, a thermally insulated threshold and innovative, weldable EPDM seals provide the best protection against cold and against water vapour condensation, even in the sensitive corner area.
desc4.p3: The LivIng Slide doors are an investment that provides long-term benefits in the form of energy saving and perceptible comfort of use regardless of the season, even in strong winds with rain, as well as outside noise.
